DOC.brief_summary: The purposes of this study are to evaluate the safety and plasma pharmacokinetics of DE-117 ophthalmic solution (one drop once daily for 7 days) in healthy male adults.
DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetic Study of DE-117 Ophthalmic Solution in Healthy Adult Male Subjects - Phase I Study -
DOC.criteria: Healthy male adult volunteers Subjects with any history of severe diseases that preclude participation in this study for safety reasons Subjects with any diseases that preclude participation in this study for safety reasons
